Scanned with OKEN ScannerNature : You are my husband. I have inherited the property in my name, Kodavaluru Gram Panchayat, Assessment No. XXXX XXXX XXXX I have full rights and indisputably own the property listed below in the Schedule, which I have paid the Panchayat taxes to, and which I consider to be a reward for the special affection I have for you, and I consider it a reward for this, and I hereby transfer it to you, without consideration, through this Settlement Document, and I hereby take possession of the property listed below in the Schedule. From now on, the Panchayat taxes payable to the Government on the property listed below in the Schedule shall be yours, and you and your heirs shall have full rights and enjoy the enjoyment of the same, including the funds, deposits, water, electricity, and other charges payable in your name. Neither I nor my heirs have any right over the property as per this Schedule. I hereby give you this settlement deed and give you this assurance that I have not made any encumbrances or any other encumbrances on this property. The property as per the Schedule is free from any encumbrances, bank loans, court seizures, tax arrears to the Government or any other encumbrances. This property is not an assignment property. I have not, till date, assigned the property as per this deed to any Government Institution or any of its affiliated institutions. There are no discrepancies in the measurements of the property as per this deed. I agree to be prosecuted under sections 27, 64 and 64A of the Indian Stamp Act and shall be liable to pay the depreciation duty if any such is found to be the case. This is a written settlement of the immovable property given with my consent.
SD. Shahida

sections.content:
The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 205 of 2026, dated 22/Jan/2026, executed by Syed Shajeedha in favour of her Husband, Syed Abdul Raheem, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 72 Sq. Yds. (or) 648 Sq. Ft., bearing Assessment Number Old (1226) , 208658001224 (New), comprised in survey number 423-1-1 and LPM No.525, situated in Kodavalur Village and Grama Panchayath, Kodavalur Mandal, within the District of SPSR Nellore registered at sub-registrar office Kovur is bounded as follows:

North by: Site of  Sheikh Shakira Begum
South by: Road 
East by: Site of Sheikh Shamshad Begum
West by: House of Sheikh Ali Riaz Begum

As per Registered Documents: 1. The property in survey number 423-1-1 and LPM No.525, situated in Kodavalur measuring about 72 Sq. yds. (or) 648 Sq. Ft., was originally owned by Syed Shajeedha , who acquired the property through inheritance from her Ancestors. [Ref: Deed] 2. The aforementioned Syed Shajeedha executed a Gift Settlement Deed on 22/Jan/2026 registered as document No. 205 of 2026 before the SRO Kovur in favour of her Husband, Syed Abdul Raheem towards the property measuring 72 Sq. Yds. (or) 648 Sq. Ft., bearing Assessment no. Old ( 1226 ) , 208658001224 (New), comprised in survey no.423-1-1 and LPM No. 525, situated at Kodavalur. (B) Additional Documents Supporting the Title : 1. The Property Tax Receipt No. TAX09012026015609059, dated 09/Jan/2026, imprinted by the Kodavalur Grama Panchayath discloses that Sayyad Shajedha has paid property tax for the period 2025-2026 towards Assessment number Old (1226) , 208658001224 (New). 2. The Certificate issued by the Village Revenue Officer, Kodavalur discloses that the property bearing Assessment no. 208658001224, admeasuring 9 Ankas , comprised in survey no 523-1-1 and LP No.525 , situated at Kodavalur is vested in the name of Syed Shajeedha as per their record.
The HTR attached discloses that  Sayyad Shajedha is the taxpayer, hence, it is presumed that the mutation proceedings were not concluded in the name of the current owner Syed Abdul Raheem.

sections.content: We have reviewed the documents provided to us as per the F.I policy and have concluded that the Syed Abdul Raheem, possesses a clear, valid, and marketable title to  the property admeasuring an extent of 72 Sq. Yds. (or) 648 Sq. Ft., bearing Assessment Number Old (1226) , 208658001224 (New),  comprised in survey number 423-1-1 and LPM No.525, situated in Kodavalur Village and Grama Panchayath, Kodavalur Mandal, within the District of SPSR Nellore registered at sub-registrar office Kovur.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible. Further, It is to be noted that House number is not mentioned in Pledging deed, whereas House number (5-0) is reflecting in the EC it is, therefore advisable for F.I. to obtain updated EC as per Deed.
